dcterms:description: A widely used benchmark in object detection field, consisting of 118k images for training and 5k testing images, evaluated using mean Average Precision (AP) at different BBox IoU thresholds.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:creator: S. Shao

dcterms:description: A benchmark for detecting humans in crowded situations, containing 15,000 training images, 4,370 validation images, and 5,000 testing images, with annotations for full body, visible body, and head.
dcterms:title: CrowdHuman
